Name: Yhoran's Tactical Trial
Description:
Yhoran, a member of the Black Shores Emergency Response Team, is currently testing new strategies against Tacet Discords. Defeat the targets and meet the special challenge goals to earn extra rewards prepared by Yhoran.
"When you're prepared, the Reaper will not come."
QuestDesc:
Yhoran, a member of the Black Shores Emergency Response Team, is currently testing new strategies against Tacet Discords. Defeat the targets and meet the special challenge goals to earn extra rewards prepared by Yhoran.
"When you're prepared, the Reaper will not come."

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Got a notification saying someone just activated the tactical trial... Phew, turns out it was you {PlayerName}!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can't believe you took down those digital Tacet Discords so fast. Truly incredible speed.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Your combat records have met the special objectives. This will be a great help to my research. Please, take these as a token of my gratitude.

Options.PlotLineKey: Sorry, but who are you again?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, my apologies. I got carried away. I’m Yhoran from the Black Shores' emergency response team.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm researching combat strategies against Tacet Discords. The challenge you completed just now is part of my research.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As you can see, I've set specific challenge goals with corresponding rewards for completion.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But it's probably too difficult... I've only gathered a few valid records so far.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Many gave up after a few rounds, complaining it was impossible to complete...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Given the situation, could you please complete the rest of these challenges for me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Excellent. I've sent you the coordinates for the other challenges.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm looking forward to witnessing your combat skills.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Good to see you again, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Congratulations on completing all the combat challenges with perfection! Those legends about you certainly do you justice—you're an incredible combat master.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, how would you rate the difficulty of these challenges?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Aha, just as I expected.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Such modesty...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, thank you so much. Without your records, it would be a real headache to proceed with the follow-up study.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, it's focused on optimizing our teams' combat training.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: By analyzing your records, we can better understand the Tacet Discords' combat patterns, body structure, and preferred techniques.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With this data, we can design specialized training to improve efficiency and reduce casualties.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I used to ignore my mentor's advice about the importance of combat efficiency and strategy... You can't really understand it until you've been through it yourself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now that I'm in a position to mentor others, I'm finding it challenging to teach newcomers.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll be sure to study your combat records throughout.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhoran
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you so much for your help!
